name: fabric-transaction
title: Fabric Transaction
description: This trigger executes a Hyperledger Fabric transaction
author: Yueming Xu

settings.name: cidattrs
settings.description: list of attributes of client ID, besides standard id, mspid, and cn

settings.name: name
settings.description: Name of the transaction for Hyperledger Fabric contract

settings.name: arguments
settings.description: list of input argument name and type

output.name: parameters
output.description: name-value pairs containing matching argument names specified by settings

output.name: cid
output.description: client ID includes standard attributes (id, mspid, cn) and configured custom attributes

reply.name: status
reply.description: status code, e.g. 200 for successful completion

reply.name: returns
reply.description: returned JSON string that could be an object or array
